https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pRUvs5XBlhny4x1fXG3SFJCBD1k.jpg Comic Russell Brand uses drugs, sex and fame in a quest for happiness, only to find it remains elusive. As he explores iconic figures such as Gandhi, Malcolm X, Che Guevara, and Jesus, he transforms himself into a political antagonist. Brand: A Second Coming
